original_title: Y si el cielo se cae
overview: La Plata, 1975. Cristina goes in search of Gladys and Chiche so that they can settle in her house in City Bell with Néstor, her husband. Her compañeros are in danger, Triple A is out of control and having played in Montoneros is a very big burden to carry.
title: Y si el cielo se cae
